commands: tc qdisc del dev h1-eth0 root
tc qdisc add dev h1-eth0 root handle 1: htb
tc class add dev h1-eth0 parent 1: classid 1:1 htb rate 100mbit ceil 100mbit
tc class add dev h1-eth0 parent 1:1 classid 1:10 htb rate 100mbit ceil 100mbit
tc filter add dev h1-eth0 protocol ip parent 1: prio 2 u32 match ip protocol 1 0xff flowid 1:10

readback.qdisc: qdisc htb 1: root refcnt 5 r2q 10 default 0 direct_packets_stat 0 direct_qlen 1000
readback.class:
class htb 1:10 parent 1:1 prio 0 rate 100Mbit ceil 100Mbit burst 1600b cburst 1600b 
class htb 1:1 root rate 100Mbit ceil 100Mbit burst 1600b cburst 1600b
readback.filter:
filter protocol ip pref 2 u32 chain 0 
filter protocol ip pref 2 u32 chain 0 fh 800: ht divisor 1 
filter protocol ip pref 2 u32 chain 0 fh 800::800 order 2048 key ht 800 bkt 0 *flowid 1:10 not_in_hw 
  match 00010000/00ff0000 at 8
